name: Decompose
description:
Something’s afoot, right? Or are you just overthinking? Decompose broaches the topics of security culture, mental health, and time management for organizers. The player wrestles with these topics amidst the bizarro reality that the targets of counter-intelligence programs and tactics like COINTELPRO and Zersetzung faced.

Decompose deals particularly with paranoia, and plays on the player’s tendencies to become attached to oddities and irregularities.

This interactive fiction is still in development and will be fleshed out further in the future.
